mapper.insert: insert into message values ((select nvl(max(MSG_num), 0)+1 from message), sysdate, #{MSG_content},'N', #{MB_numS}, #{MB_numR})
mapper.select: select count(*) from message where MB_numR=#{MB_numR} and MSG_del='N'
select count(*) from message where MB_numS=#{MB_numS} and MSG_del='N'
select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select * from message where MB_numR=#{MB_numR} and MSG_del='N' order by MSG_num desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select * from message where MB_numS=#{MB_numS} and MSG_del='N' order by MSG_num desc) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update message set MSG_del='Y' where MSG_num=#{string}
